attributes.description:
Brand New Nissan Qashqai 

Features

warranty 6 years/150 000km	
service plan 3 years/90000km

gearshift paddles, ABS, brake assist (BAS/EBA)	
electro-mechanical parking brake, hill-start assist / hill holder	
traction control, stability control, alloy wheels/rims	
tyre pressure sensor/monitor / deflation detection system	
6 airbags, climate control / automatic air conditioning
Audio System Apple Carplay/Android Auto
multi-function steering wheel controls
lane change / blind spot warning/assist/monitor	
controls interface screen, navigation, active/adaptive cruise control
Bluetooth connectivity, USB port, Front power socket 12V
remote central locking keyless access+start / hands-free key keyless start
child-proof/safety lock	
electric windows & mirrors
memory for electric-adjust mirrors
heated exterior mirrors	
electric-fold/retractable mirrors	
leather upholstery
electric seat adjustment - driver	
memory for electric seat adjustment	
electric seat adjustment - front passenger	
Massaging & heated seats - front
LED headlights, high-beam assist	
park distance control (PDC) - front & rear	
rear + surround view camera	
roof rails

Terms & conditions apply,
Images for illustration purposes only,
*On the road fees excluded,
Finance available subject to approval,
E&OE,

Finance available,
Nationwide Delivery,
Trade-ins Welcome

attributes.description: If you are in the market for a reliable and affordable pre-owned vehicle, then speak to our sales team at Renault East London to find you the right vehicle at the right price. Buying a vehicle is a big deal. Our sales team deliver exceptional service and care and are here to assist you with all your motoring needs. Please enquire about existing extras & features and how we can assist you with finding the right additional car accessory for your vehicle of choice.  We offer vehicle finance solutions and will structure a financial package that will suit your exact budget and needs.
